parallel.distributed
Class DBarrierSrv

java.lang.Object
  parallel.distributed.DBarrierSrv
public class DBarrierSrv
extends java.lang.Object

class implements a server for distributed barrier functionality. Multiple JVMs can connect to this server and ask for the barrier corresponding to this server. Each client may as well be multi-threaded.

Title: popt4jlib

Description: A Parallel Meta-Heuristic Optimization Library in Java
